T02D1681:300a-1: bha ga b'an shr'i mah'a su kha badzra satva s'a dha nam /
T02D1681:300a-3: bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1681:300a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1681:300a-5: bde ba kun gyi mchog rig mnyam med ye shes gzugs //
T02D1681:300a-6: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog min //
T02D1681:300a-7: bdag nyid kun du rtag gnas srid gsum mchog gsum gzugs //
T02D1681:300a-8: dpal ldan tshad med bde ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'gyur pa //
T02D1681:300a-9: bde chen bde skyed rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po la //
T02D1681:300a-10: 'gro ba gsum gyi gnyen gyur phyogs pas phyag byas te //
T02D1681:300a-11: sems can dus ngan rnyog pas nyen cing dge ster ba //
T02D1681:300a-12: yul la chags pa'i nyon mongs mun nag chen po rnams //
T02D1681:300a-13: bla ma'i lung gis ser sna'i tha ba 'joms 'gyur ba //
T02D1681:300a-14: bde byed byang chub bla med bde ba thob pa'i phyir //
T02D1681:300a-15: 'di yi sgrub pa chog cung zad bshad par bya //
T02D1681:300a-16: 'jig rten mgon po rdo rje sems //
T02D1681:300a-17: skyob pa pos ni rnam gsum pa //
T02D1681:300a-18: rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad las //
T02D1681:300a-19: bde bas thams cad lha nyid do //
T02D1681:300a-20: rdo rje byang chub sems 'di ni //
T02D1681:300a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo ste //
T02D1681:300a-22: de bas bdag nyid kun sbyor bas //
T02D1681:300a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de //
T02D1681:300a-25: de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad pas //
T02D1681:300a-26: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1681:300a-27: de bas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya //
T02D1681:300a-28: rdo rje byin rlabs tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:300b-0: ting nge 'dzin ni bdag dbang @300b bskur //
T02D1681:300b-1: snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig gis //
T02D1681:300b-2: gsang ba'i mchod pa mchog gis bskul //
T02D1681:300b-3: sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba //
T02D1681:300b-4: rnal 'byor thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D1681:300b-5: de nyid bcu la sogs tshul gyis //
T02D1681:300b-6: thams cad skye 'gyur bsgrub par bya //
T02D1681:300b-7: 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D1681:300b-8: de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dag / ci bder yul la longs spyod pas //
T02D1681:300b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po
T02D1681:300b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par 'dod pas thog mar
T02D1681:300b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par 'dod pas thog mar
T02D1681:300b-13: rdo rje slob dpon la bsnyen bkur ji lta ba
T02D1681:300b-15: dam tshig gi sdom pa'i dbang la sogs pa mnos te /
T02D1681:300b-20: skyed mos tshal gyi gnas la sogs par //
T02D1681:300b-21: rang gi stan 'jam zhing reg na bde ba padma
T02D1681:300b-22: sna tshogs kyi 'dab mas g-yogs pa de ni gdan
T02D1681:300b-23: thams cad kyi nang na bsngags pa ste /
T02D1681:300b-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang du rnam par rol
T02D1681:300b-25: pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1681:300b-26: mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i bde blangs te /
T02D1681:300b-27: aom badzra padma aa san ma h'a yo ga pi ta h'um zhes byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1681:300b-28: stan bde ba la sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam par
T02D1681:300b-29: gnas te ji ltar byin gyis brlabs bde bzhin du
T02D1681:300b-30: thams cad kyi stan dang sbyar ro //
T02D1681:300b-31: mnyam par gzhag nas rgyal ba kun //
T02D1681:300b-32: nye bar nam mkha' thams cad la //
T02D1681:300b-33: rdo rje se gol bcibs pa yis //
T02D1681:300b-34: rdo rje gtogs pas bsdu bar bya //
T02D1681:300b-36: rab tu sbyor bas yang dag brjod //
T02D1681:300b-37: thal mo gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1681:300b-38: zhi ba'i thal mos mnyes par bya //
T02D1681:300b-39: cho ga bzhin du phyag byas te //
T02D1681:300b-40: ci rigs mchod pa rnams byas la //
T02D1681:300b-41: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams //
T02D1681:300b-42: dbang po kun nas spro bar bya //
T02D1681:300b-43: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa //
T02D1681:300b-44: zhi ba'i thal mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1681:300b-45: sha rdza gandar tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:300b-46: rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod par bya //
T02D1681:300b-47: mnyam nyid mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can //
T02D1681:300b-48: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
T02D1681:301a-0: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin @301a * //
T02D1681:301a-2: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can //
T02D1681:301a-3: yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de //
T02D1681:301a-4: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin //
T02D1681:301a-5: dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
T02D1681:301a-6: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol //
T02D1681:301a-7: rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D1681:301a-8: smin lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
T02D1681:301a-9: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa //
T02D1681:301a-10: thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
T02D1681:301a-11: tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yis //
T02D1681:301a-12: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //
T02D1681:301a-13: khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mtshog stsol mdzad pa yi //
T02D1681:301a-14: thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g-yo 'gag pa yongs mi 'gyur //
T02D1681:301a-15: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
T02D1681:301a-16: mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas ;
T02D1681:301a-17: / khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
T02D1681:301a-18: mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa //
T02D1681:301a-19: dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
T02D1681:301a-20: de nas sngon tshe gang byas pa'i //
T02D1681:301a-21: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya //
T02D1681:301a-22: rgyal ba rnams ni dge mdzad la //
T02D1681:301a-23: ma lus rjes su yi rang bya //
T02D1681:301a-24: de rnams gsol gdab par bya ba //
T02D1681:301a-25: skad cig skad cig sems par bya //
T02D1681:301a-26: ma lus pa yi dge ba rnams //
T02D1681:301a-27: sems can rnams la bsngo bar bya //
T02D1681:301a-28: de nas brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pa //
T02D1681:301a-29: snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sems gzhan la phan
T02D1681:301a-30: pa gcig pu mthar gyur pa'i mchog ma lus lus
T02D1681:301a-31: pa med pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa'i 'gro ba
T02D1681:301a-32: thams cad bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las
T02D1681:301a-33: bsgral bar bya'o snyam du bsams te /
T02D1681:301a-34: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1681:301a-35: dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bde ba chen po
T02D1681:301a-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du
T02D1681:301a-37: byas nas padma'i lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi mthil la
T02D1681:301a-38: ma ta yi ge gnyis las nyi ma dang zla
T02D1681:301a-39: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cha thams cad kyis rnam par
T02D1681:301a-40: mdzes par mngon du brtags te /
T02D1681:301a-41: de'i steng du 'dis rdo rje dang padmor bsam par bya ste /
T02D1681:301b-0: aom @301b ma h'a su kha sa manta bha dra
T02D1681:301b-1: h'um aa zhes brjod nas rdo rje'i tshig las mngon
T02D1681:301b-3: spro ba bya ba ni 'od zer gyi rgyan sna
T02D1681:301b-4: tshogs kyi phreng bas spro ba dang bsdu ba bya
T02D1681:301b-5: ste / g-yon pa'i sor mo thams cad du yi ge sa bon lnga las gzugs mar bsam /
T02D1681:301b-6: g-yas kyi rnams la gtso bo rnams tshul 'di bsam mo //
T02D1681:301b-9: de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1681:301b-11: rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa'i snying po ni /
T02D1681:301b-13: de yang snying po 'di lan gnyis sam gsum du brjod de dbab par byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1681:301b-14: aom badzra padma sam yo ga a'a be sha a'a be sha ma h'a su kha /
T02D1681:301b-17: dza:h'um bam ho:bcings pa de 'bab par gyur gyi bar
T02D1681:301b-18: du brjod nas de nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o
T02D1681:301b-19: // aom badzra bandha ma h'a kro dha ha na da ha pa tsa ga ta ya /
T02D1681:301b-22: dzny'a na mah'a ta monta ka ra bi ti tsi gi ra bi ki ra h'um /
T02D1681:301b-23: trad ta trad te ta trad te /
T02D1681:301b-24: de nas rang gi lus mi shes pa'i dri ma
T02D1681:301b-25: dang bral nas zla ba lta bur yongs su dag
T02D1681:301b-26: par bsgoms te / aom sarbba bi shuddhi dharm'a ta sa ma ya h'um zhes yid la brjod do //
T02D1681:301b-27: de nas bcings pa de slar gnyis su bcings nas
T02D1681:301b-28: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las lcags kyu ltar bcus
T02D1681:301b-29: te / de bzhin du rang gi snying gar sngags 'dis grol bar bya'o //
T02D1681:301b-30: aom badzra bandha aam gu sha mah'a kro dha dza:h'um bam ho: //
T02D1681:301b-32: de nas bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bsams te /
T02D1681:301b-33: ye shes yongs su dag pa tsam la dmigs nas
T02D1681:301b-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag la
T02D1681:301b-36: stong pa yod med shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
T02D1681:301b-37: nam mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
T02D1681:301b-38: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1681:301b-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
T02D1681:301b-40: de nas de bdag gis bdag la bskul bar rig
T02D1681:301b-41: nas bdag nyid bde ba chen po rim pa 'di
T02D1681:301b-43: h'um gis phyag rgya dang bcas par byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1681:301b-44: de la phyag rgya ni rdo rje bcings pa las brkyang ste /
T02D1681:301b-45: mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi dbus su mthe bong rtse sbyar nas /
T02D1681:301b-47: snying gar dbu ma rtse mo can du byas te /
T02D1681:302a-0: @302a * // aa'i padma'i steng du gzhag go //
T02D1681:302a-1: aom mah'a su kha sa manta pa tra aa bhi
T02D1681:302a-2: shinytsa h'um aa zhes brjod nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1681:302a-3: bskyod do // yang na aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtags te /
T02D1681:302a-4: sa bon rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bzhin bsams te /
T02D1681:302a-5: h'um gdan la aa la sogs pas kyang 'od zer
T02D1681:302a-6: gyi chas brgyan pa ltar bsams nas sa bon h'um
T02D1681:302a-7: de las rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo //
T02D1681:302a-8: h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um zhes brjod pa 'dis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dir mngon du 'grub ste /
T02D1681:302a-9: rdo rje'i ye shes de las ye shes rnam lngar gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs su byung nas //
T02D1681:302a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D1681:302a-11: po la sogs par kun du snang bar byed par
T02D1681:302a-12: bsams te / de bdag nyid rdo rje la slar
T02D1681:302a-13: 'dus pas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gyur par
T02D1681:302a-14: bsams te / bsams la / thams cad bde byed dkar ba'i phyir //
T02D1681:302a-15: thams cad dag la rnam dag ste //
T02D1681:302a-16: zla ba gang ba dkar pa'i sku //
T02D1681:302a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde //
T02D1681:302a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D1681:302a-20: g-yas kyis 'dud pa'i snying ga ru //
T02D1681:302a-21: 'dzum bcas rdo rje gsor bar mdzad //
T02D1681:302a-22: sems dpa'i skyil krung dbyibs su gnas //
T02D1681:302a-23: chu skyes spyan yang yid tsam rgyas //
T02D1681:302a-24: sangs rgyas rin chen dbu rgyan rnams //
T02D1681:302a-25: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1681:302a-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi mchog / aa las yang dag bskyed byas te //
T02D1681:302a-28: de nas kun du spro bar bya //
T02D1681:302a-29: sangs rgyas rin chen khams gsum ni //
T02D1681:302a-30: rin chen gzhan dang mtshungs pa med //
T02D1681:302a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che //
T02D1681:302a-32: de bas dbu rgyan mchog ces bya //
T02D1681:302a-33: bdag gi gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs te //
T02D1681:302a-34: dag cing dang ba'i chu 'dra ba //
T02D1681:302a-35: ngo bo nyid kyi mthar gyur pas //
T02D1681:302a-36: rang bzhin gyi ni dngos grub 'grub //
T02D1681:302a-37: de nas byin rlabs tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:302a-38: snying ga smin mtshams mgrin spyi bor //
T02D1681:302a-39: gar bcas lag pa 'dud pa yis //
T02D1681:302a-40: rdo rje phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
T02D1681:302a-41: byin rlabs phyag rgya 'di yin te //
T02D1681:302a-42: rdo rje khu tshur bcings byas te //
T02D1681:302a-43: mdzub mo mthe bo'i mtshan nyid du //
T02D1681:302a-44: g-yas pa'i mthe bo dbang po yis //
T02D1681:302b-0: kha ru bcug nas bsdam par @302b bya ;
T02D1681:302b-1: /'di yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis //
T02D1681:302b-2: rdo rje dga' chen thob par 'gyur //
T02D1681:302b-3: bde ba chen po bde byed che //
T02D1681:302b-4: phyi yi gsang ba rnam sdud yid //
T02D1681:302b-5: rdo rje dga' ba rab bcings nas //
T02D1681:302b-6: dbu ma bcings ba nang du gzhug / mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam bsnol ba'i //
T02D1681:302b-7: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub par bya ;
T02D1681:302b-8: / bcing ba de yis byin brlabs na //
T02D1681:302b-10: 'di yis ji ltar rigs pa yis //
T02D1681:302b-11: blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya //
T02D1681:302b-12: dar gyi bcing bas bcing bya ste //
T02D1681:302b-13: 'gying dang bcas pas mtha' dgrol bya //
T02D1681:302b-14: dar dpyangs 'dra ba'i tshul nyid kyis //
T02D1681:302b-15: thal mo yis ni bstan par bya //
T02D1681:302b-16: sngags shes pa yis sngags 'di yis //
T02D1681:302b-18: 'di ni rang gi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1681:302b-19: mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil krung las //
T02D1681:302b-20: mdzub mo rtse mo dgug par bya //
T02D1681:302b-21: gung mo mchog gnyis mnyam sbyor mnyam //
T02D1681:302b-22: lhag ma rdo rje thal mo 'od //
T02D1681:302b-23: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur rgya //
T02D1681:302b-24: rang byung ba yis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1681:302b-25: rgyal srid mchog gi dngos grub kun //
T02D1681:302b-26: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1681:302b-27: spyi bo dang ni dpral ba gnyis //
T02D1681:302b-28: glo dang de bzhin rgyab nyid du //
T02D1681:302b-29: byas nas dar dpyangs tshul du bya //
T02D1681:302b-30: aom buddha aa bhi she ke ru ru sphu ru
T02D1681:302b-31: dzva la tishtha buddha lo tsa sarbba aartha s'a dha
T02D1681:302b-32: na aa bhi shi nytsa mam sv'a h'a /
T02D1681:302b-33: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1681:302b-34: rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin dbang bskur ro //
T02D1681:302b-35: aom badzra ratna aam bhi she ka hi ri mi
T02D1681:302b-36: ti ri ni shr'i ya aa bhi shinytsa mam sv'a
T02D1681:302b-37: h'a / rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1681:302b-38: aom padma aa bhi she ka t'a re tu re tutt'a re ai bhi shi nytsa mam sv'a h'a //
T02D1681:302b-39: de'i phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas rin chen gyis dbang
T02D1681:302b-40: bskur bas dbu ma'i rtse mo phab pa ni padma
T02D1681:302b-41: rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1681:302b-42: 'dis snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02D1681:302b-43: rdo rje thal mo rab sbyar te //
T02D1681:302b-44: gnyis kyis rin chen 'dzin pa ltar //
T02D1681:302b-45: ji ltar rigs pas mnyam par bya //
T02D1681:302b-46: mthe bo'i rtse mo gdong bzhi yis //
T02D1681:302b-47: phyag rgya de nas rab bsgyur te //
T02D1681:302b-48: g-yas pa nyid du gzhag par bya //
T02D1681:302b-49: blo dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yis //
T02D1681:302b-50: sngags rigs de bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02D1681:302b-51: aom ratna ratna aa bhi she ke tram tram /
T02D1681:302b-52: bha bha ta ta tra tra tra tra aa bhi shinytsa mam sv'a h'a /
T02D1681:303a-0: @303a * // rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1681:303a-1: rdo rje thal mo gdab pa ste //
T02D1681:303a-2: mdzub mo'i rtse mo yud tsam dgug / mthe bo dpa' bo'i skyil krung du //
T02D1681:303a-3: lhag ma rnams ni 'od bzhin btang //
T02D1681:303a-4: sngon bzhin yang ni spyang bar bya //
T02D1681:303a-5: las kyi rin chen dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1681:303a-6: aom badzra karmma ratna aa bhi she ke hi hi hi hi /
T02D1681:303a-7: shr'i padma ba da mu she aa bhi shinytsa mam sv'a h'a /
T02D1681:303a-8: rig sngags spyis bdag la dbang bskur bar bstan te
T02D1681:303a-9: rang gi rigs kyi thog ma nyid du dbang bskur
T02D1681:303a-10: ro // de ltar bdag nyid dbang bskur bar byas nas //
T02D1681:303a-12: rdo rje khu tshur brkyang ba las mgrin par bzhag ste /
T02D1681:303a-13: aom badzra ka ba tsa y'a mam ham bam yam /
T02D1681:303a-14: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod nas bcings pa de las mdzub mo brkyang ste /
T02D1681:303a-15: so so nas gdod sprad pa mdud pa'i tshul gyis snying gnas brtsams te /
T02D1681:303a-16: spyi bo'i gtsug gi bar du sngags 'dis aom tum ka ba tsa yam mam h'um /
T02D1681:303a-17: lan gsum du byas na lus la cis kyang mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1681:303a-18: de nas aa las bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje
T02D1681:303a-19: shin tu dga' ba ma'am rdo rje sems ma bskyed
T02D1681:303a-20: de / bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs dang /
T02D1681:303a-21: kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa g-yas g-yon gyi padmo'i
T02D1681:303a-22: dbyibs can du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1681:303a-23: pa la snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1681:303a-25: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis brtsam par bya ba ni lung ngo //
T02D1681:303a-26: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes brjod cing bcing ba ni nang gi
T02D1681:303a-27: dbu ma'i lcags kyu rang gi snying gar lcags kyus
T02D1681:303a-28: drang bar bya / de nyid gdong reg pa ni zhags pa'o //
T02D1681:303a-29: de nyid lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni bcing ba'o //
T02D1681:303a-30: de nyid rtse mo bsdams pa ni dgyes pa'o //
T02D1681:303a-31: 'di ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1681:303a-32: phyi'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1681:303a-33: de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1681:303a-34: rdo rje bcing ba gnyis su bya ste /
T02D1681:303a-35: g-yon pa'i steng du g-yas pa bzhag nas mthe'u chung
T02D1681:303a-36: bsnol ba la g-yon gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs
T02D1681:303a-37: nas g-yas kyi mdzub mo dgug pa ni rdo rje
T02D1681:303a-39: aom badzra k'a ma aam ku sha ka ta ka
T02D1681:303a-40: ta h'um dza:zhes pa'i snying po dang bcas pas drang
T02D1681:303a-41: bar bya'o // de nyid las phan tshun du mdzub mo gnyis zhags pa ltar bcings te /
T02D1681:303a-42: aom badzra pra be sha ya phra be sha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1681:303b-0: @303b zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas gzhug go //
T02D1681:303b-1: de nyid las phan tshun shin tu bskums te /
T02D1681:303b-2: aom badzra k'a ma bandha bandha bam /
T02D1681:303b-4: de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar
T02D1681:303b-5: gzung ste rgyab sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje dgyes
T02D1681:303b-6: pa'o // aom badzra dushti k'a ma su ke sho ta ya ho //
T02D1681:303b-7: zhes brjod nas phyag rgya des dgyes par bya ste /
T02D1681:303b-9: zhi ba'i thal mo gsum gyis dgyes pa bskyed nas
T02D1681:303b-10: mdun du rdo rje shin tu dga' ba la sogs
T02D1681:303b-11: pa mngon du blta bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyis
T02D1681:303b-12: bskul bar bya'o // rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen
T02D1681:303b-13: skal bzang khyod bdag lags so sgrub la rtogs par
T02D1681:303b-14: bskul bar bya'o // mdzad du gsol // de bzhin
T02D1681:303b-15: gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro
T02D1681:303b-16: sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud
T02D1681:303b-17: rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag
T02D1681:303b-18: la grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1681:303b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol //
T02D1681:303b-21: dza:h'um bam ho:kye ma bde mchog bde bas gzung ba rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzad du gsol /
T02D1681:303b-22: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1681:303b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sna tshogs sgyu ma mkha' 'gro slob mas gzung du gsol //
T02D1681:303b-24: de nas 'jug pa de langs te /
T02D1681:303b-25: ma dang ta las gyur pa'i mig gis nam mkha'i
T02D1681:303b-26: ngos la bde bar gshags pa rnams kyis til 'bru
T02D1681:303b-27: bzhin btags te rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas dza:h'um
T02D1681:303b-28: bam ho:zhes brjod cing rang gi lha la mchod pa'i
T02D1681:303b-29: phyir de rnams kyi snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1681:303b-30: yang na rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya stsal te /
T02D1681:303b-31: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1681:303b-32: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas //
T02D1681:303b-34: mdun du zla ba'i kha dog can //
T02D1681:303b-35: chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum dang bcas //
T02D1681:303b-37: sangs rgyas rin chen rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1681:303b-38: rgyab tu lha mo chu srin gyi //
T02D1681:303b-40: dpal byed dran pa sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1681:303b-41: sangs rgyas dbu rgyan mchog 'dzin ma //
T02D1681:303b-42: sngo mthing mchog gi phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1681:303b-43: phyag rgya rang gis 'khyud pa yi //
T02D1681:303b-44: sangs rgyas dbu rgyan phreng ba la //
T02D1681:303b-45: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1681:303b-46: 'dud bcas g-yon nas sngo bsangs te //
T02D1681:304a-3: rang gi snying po rdzogs par bya //
T02D1681:304a-4: bzhi po de rnams ni phyag rgya phyi mo'i tshogs
T02D1681:304a-5: su bstan te gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro'i
T02D1681:304a-6: lha mo rnams phyogs bzhir rang gi stan la padmo'i
T02D1681:304a-7: lo ma la gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1681:304a-8: padmo'i phyi mtshams su sgeg mo dang /
T02D1681:304a-11: gar ma la sogs pa grva bzhir gzhag go / de bzhin du me tog ma dang /
T02D1681:304a-14: sna tshogs kyi dri la sogs pa yang phyogs mtshams su gzhag go //
T02D1681:304a-21: pa ta ha brdung ba la sogs pa yang phyogs phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D1681:304a-22: shar gyi sgo ru bsam pa ni /
T02D1681:304a-23: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa mchog / g-yon du rdo rje zhags pa ste //
T02D1681:304a-24: nub tu rdo rje lcags kyu rgyud //
T02D1681:304a-25: byang du dril bu bshad pa ste //
T02D1681:304a-26: de rnams rang gi las la brtson //
T02D1681:304a-27: kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D1681:304a-28: rang gi lha la rjes mthun pa'i //
T02D1681:304a-29: rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin ldan par //
T02D1681:304a-30: sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya //
T02D1681:304a-31: rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1681:304a-32: ci rigs mnyam par gzhag bya ste //
T02D1681:304a-33: mnyam par gzhag pa'i ting 'dzin nyid //
T02D1681:304a-35: de nas ji ltar sbyor ba yi //
T02D1681:304a-36: sbyor dgyes pa yis rol byas te //
T02D1681:304a-37: sbyor ba bzhi yi tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:304a-38: mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu bya //
T02D1681:304a-39: mchod pa thams cad ma 'byor na //
T02D1681:304a-40: phyag rgya bcing zhing mchod bya ba //
T02D1681:304a-41: rang nyid lha yi ngo bo la //
T02D1681:304a-42: de dag gis mchod dmigs par bya //
T02D1681:304a-43: brdung dang gar du bcas pa yis //
T02D1681:304a-44: ste ga bcas dga' bas bde ba yi //
T02D1681:304a-45: glu la sogs pa'i ro ldan pas //
T02D1681:304a-47: bde ba chen po skal bzang khyod //
T02D1681:304a-48: thams cad 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod chags pas //
T02D1681:304a-49: bcom ldan 'das la bdag bzhes shig / mchod pa
T02D1681:304a-50: thams cad kyi cho ga la sogs pa sbyor ba
T02D1681:304a-51: dang ldan pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1681:304a-52: dza:h'um bam ho:ru ta ma ta sma ra tra /
T02D1681:304a-63: sarba ka te ta ghe ta ghe ta ghe /
T02D1681:304b-3: hu lu hu lu hu lu /
T02D1681:304b-4: aa la la la ho ru ta ma ta /
T02D1681:304b-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa' bde
T02D1681:304b-7: ba chen po la 'dis mchod pa thams cad dbul
T02D1681:304b-8: bar bya'o // te ghe ta ghe /
T02D1681:304b-17: dam tshig gsum gyi brdung ba ste /
T02D1681:304b-18: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs bskul ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D1681:304b-19: de rnams kyi brdung ba dbyangs su blang zhing sha
T02D1681:304b-20: rdza dang de ba ti dbyangs 'dis kyang sbyor ba'i
T02D1681:304b-21: bdag nyid kyis h'um la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul
T02D1681:304b-22: bar bya'o // rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i padmo rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1681:304b-23: mchod pa gsal bas rjes su mchod byas mchog /
T02D1681:304b-24: rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par
T02D1681:304b-25: mdzod // kye mchog bde ba'i dam mchog rang gi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1681:304b-26: mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor shin tu skal bzang sa chog brnyes pa //
T02D1681:304b-27: rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la rol cig rol cig ho //
T02D1681:304b-28: kye mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1681:304b-29: rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so //
T02D1681:304b-30: 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen //
T02D1681:304b-31: dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g-yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur //
T02D1681:304b-32: rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba sgyu ma mkha' 'gro ho //
T02D1681:304b-33: kye dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs la ston /
T02D1681:304b-34: dza:h'um bam ho:kye ma ho bde mchog bde bas drongs //
T02D1681:304b-35: rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzod //
T02D1681:304b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D1681:304b-38: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1681:304b-39: slob ma dag ni gsung du gsol //
T02D1681:304b-40: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs bde bas bskul ba'o //
T02D1681:304b-41: g-yas dang g-yon gyi lag pa yis //
T02D1681:304b-42: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gar byas te //
T02D1681:304b-43: g-yon gyi mthe bo srin lag sbyar //
T02D1681:304b-44: g-yas gyi ba dan gsum pa yis //
T02D1681:304b-45: phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni //
T02D1681:304b-46: sangs rgyas kun dang yang dag 'grogs //
T02D1681:304b-47: thams cad mchog gi dngos grub che //
T02D1681:304b-48: dbang phyug chen po rab tu 'grub //
T02D1681:305a-0: @305a * // de nyid dor ba'i tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:305a-1: slad du brdzun pa cher byas te //
T02D1681:305a-2: bsgyur nas g-yas kyi 'gram pa dang //
T02D1681:305a-3: spyi gtsug mtshams su bzhag pa las //
T02D1681:305a-4: slad du gar gyi dbab tshul gyi //
T02D1681:305a-5: cha lugs kun gyis rab bsgyur cing //
T02D1681:305a-6: skal bzang h'um gam dbyangs ldan pas ;
T02D1681:305a-7: / mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya //
T02D1681:305a-8: la lar zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su snang bar snang //
T02D1681:305a-9: la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs //
T02D1681:305a-10: la lar mdangs bzangs gzi chen zhe bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang //
T02D1681:305a-11: la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston //
T02D1681:305a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' grub phyir 'dul mkhas ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las //
T02D1681:305a-13: aa ral thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod //
T02D1681:305a-14: ru ta ta ma te aa la la la ho //
T02D1681:305a-15: rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa //
T02D1681:305a-16: dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzod aa la la la ho //
T02D1681:305a-17: rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod //
T02D1681:305a-18: 'di yis ba dan gsum dang ldan par gar du bya'o //
T02D1681:305a-19: rab tu dga' dang rjes su chags par dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra bas rgyas btab pas //
T02D1681:305a-20: rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod //
T02D1681:305a-21: rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgrang ba'i longs spyod dang //
T02D1681:305a-22: rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs //
T02D1681:305a-24: kye ma ho rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs rol cig ho //
T02D1681:305a-25: de bas slong rnam par rol //
T02D1681:305a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
T02D1681:305a-29: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi slob ma gzung du gsol
T02D1681:305a-30: // kye bde ba'i mchog grub par mdzod //
T02D1681:305a-31: kye ma ho bad bas bde ba stsol //
T02D1681:305b-0: dam pa rab tu zhugs par @305b mdzod //
T02D1681:305b-1: bdag la rab tu bde bar gyur //
T02D1681:305b-3: kye ma ho shi shi bzhugs shig mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / yongs su skor //
T02D1681:305b-5: de nas gar dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1681:305b-6: dbyangs 'di rnams kyis glur blangs shing //
T02D1681:305b-7: dpal ldan g-yon du 'dud pa yis //
T02D1681:305b-8: g-yas kyi ba dan gsum du bya //
T02D1681:305b-9: de ltar g-yas dang g-yon tshul gyis //
T02D1681:305b-10: sems dpa'i skyil krung bsnyems byas te //
T02D1681:305b-11: steng du dor dang 'og tu dor //
T02D1681:305b-12: bskor dang de bzhin byug byas te //
T02D1681:305b-13: me tog bdug pa mar me mchog / dri yi mchod pa bskor ba yis //
T02D1681:305b-14: lhag ma gar gyi tshul gyis su //
T02D1681:305b-15: gling bu pi wang rdza rnga mchog / de bzhin cang te'u rnams dag kyang //
T02D1681:305b-16: g-yon gyi khu tshur rab bsdams te //
T02D1681:305b-17: lag pa g-yas pas brdung bya ste //
T02D1681:305b-18: rang gi ming gis bskul bcas pas //
T02D1681:305b-19: sngags pas mchod pa dbul bar bya //
T02D1681:305b-20: zhi ba'i thal mo bde mchog gis //
T02D1681:305b-21: thal mo'i sbyor bas dgyes ba bskyed //
T02D1681:305b-22: g-yon du 'dod pas phyag bya zhing //
T02D1681:305b-23: 'dzum dang bcas pas lta ba'i mig / smin ma mig dang mchu gdon pa //
T02D1681:305b-24: kha dang lus kyi gdon pa yis //
T02D1681:305b-25: cha lugs ji bzhin gar bya ste /
T02D1681:305b-27: // phyag rgya thams cad dbul bar bya //
T02D1681:305b-28: na mo stu sarbba buddhe bhya: / zhes pas phyag rgya rab gnas te //
T02D1681:305b-29: mchod pa mchog gi dngos grub rnams //
T02D1681:305b-30: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1681:305b-31: phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis btab na //
T02D1681:305b-32: bdag nyid dang ni yang na gzhan //
T02D1681:305b-33: sgrub pa po ni myur 'grub ste //
T02D1681:305b-35: langs pa'i tshe yang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1681:305b-36: srung ba la sogs pa byas te //
T02D1681:305b-37: bde ba'i thal mos dgyes pa bskyed nas ci dga' bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D1681:305b-38: aom rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang //
T02D1681:305b-39: rdo rje rin chen bla med pa //
T02D1681:305b-40: rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang //
T02D1681:305b-41: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D1681:305b-42: aa ho su kha zhes pa'i ming //
T02D1681:305b-43: rdo rje sems gang gang klog pa //
T02D1681:305b-44: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //
T02D1681:305b-45: bsod nams rnams ni byin brlabs 'gyur //
